member.name: D3D12_DRED_PAGE_FAULT_OUTPUT
member.summary: Describes allocation data related to a GPU page fault on a given virtual address (VA). Contains the VA of a GPU page fault, together with a list of matching allocation nodes for active objects, and a list of allocation nodes for recently deleted objects.

member.name: D3D12_DRED_PAGE_FAULT_OUTPUT.PageFaultVA
member.summary: A D3D12_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS containing the GPU virtual address (VA) of the faulting operation if device removal was due to a GPU page fault.

member.name: D3D12_DRED_PAGE_FAULT_OUTPUT.pHeadExistingAllocationNode
member.summary: A pointer to a constant object representing the head of a linked list of allocation nodes for active allocated runtime objects with virtual address (VA) ranges that match the faulting VA (PageFaultVA). Has a value of nullptr if the list is empty.

member.name: D3D12_DRED_PAGE_FAULT_OUTPUT.pHeadRecentFreedAllocationNode
member.summary: A pointer to a constant object representing the head of a linked list of allocation nodes for recently freed runtime objects with virtual address (VA) ranges that match the faulting VA (PageFaultVA). Has a value of nullptr if the list is empty.
